participant_1.background:
I have a love for travel and my furry friends.
I'm working on getting my own place so I can ride my horse whenever I want.
i live with my parents.
I enjoy picking wild strawberries with my son on our weekend camping trips.
I am an engineer who sings in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I went on vacation to the beach and enjoyed the sun and sand.
i work part time.
my favorite movie is titanic.
i teach at a large school.
I'm not great at keeping up with my family, but I'm trying to be better.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Great! I just got back from a beach vacation.
Oh nice! I love the beach. I just picked a few strawberries with my son on our camping trip.
That sounds lovely! How old is your son?
He is 7 years old. He loves camping.
Aww! I bet he is a handful. I teach at a large school and have a lot of kids in my class.
That sounds like fun! I am a singer and an engineer. I work part time as an engineer and sing on the weekends.
That's awesome! I have always wanted to learn to sing.
You should! It's really fun! What is your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is Titanic. I love the love story.
That's a great movie! I love the romance in it.
